attributes.action: instruct the Health Minister not to close or down grade Frenchay Hospital on the grounds, that it has all the expertise in so many specalised areas, its location and access including helicopters and is Vital for all the expanding population of South Gloucestershire and Bristol.  The decision to close Must not be taken on the grounds that the land is of far greater value for speculators to build houses on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
